Limited time offer in Romania:
Dedicated Server with Intel Xeon L5630 | 8 GB RAM DDR3 ECC | 500 GB HDD | 1 Gbps Best Effort - 35 EUR/mo
Up to 24h setup time.

Free add-ons available (via ticket):
BGP Session with transit via AS3280
Free vlan to ROPN-IX

Small disclaimer:
We may provide you with superior HDD or CPU if L5630 is no longer available at the time of your order.

Order link: https://mserver.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=138
